name: Space Outpost
description:
Whether you like endless runners or puzzle games, Space Outpost will satisfy your needs.

Blue Moon

Blue moon is an endless runner in which you control a spaceship trying to intercept blue moons.

Try to catch the maximum number of blue moons possible while avoiding all the asteroids heading towards you. Adjust the difficulty according to your abilities and try to beat your highest score.

Green Hole

Green Hole is a puzzle platformer in which you control a spaceship that tries to find the fastest way to the green hole.

Green holes are powerful creations that allow you to navigate between levels.

Explore 15 levels of tunnels and try to find the fastest way to the green hole while competing to beat your best time.
